subject: Request for a return label on order #SSN2347
description_text:
Hello i want to receive a return label as i wrote earlier.

Hello,

I`d like to send it back to your warehouse in Germany so i will need an 
adвress or already prepared shipping label. And because I didn`t open the
package and assuming that it came with no defects how can i pay the shipping
cost?

conversations.body_text:
?



---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: dikiv4ik@seznam.cz
Komu: service@simsonn.com
Datum: 20. 8. 2025 16:08:21
Předmět: Request for a return label on order #SSN2347
"Hello i want to receive a return label as i wrote earlier.

Hello,

I`d like to send it back to your warehouse in Germany so i will need an 
adвress or already prepared shipping label. And because I didn`t open the
package and assuming that it came with no defects how can i pay the shipping
cost?
 "

Hi Dikiv4ik,     I apologise for the delayed response. The estimated cost for DPD's door-to-door collection service from the Czech Republic is €46.54, while the estimated postage via DHL's drop-off point is €26.05. You may select your preferred return method. Should you opt for DHL self-posting, you may send the parcel to our German warehouse at the following address:  Recipient/Company: Gubitz GmbH-KBL  Street + House Number: Hüttenkamp 12  Postcode: 24536  Town/City: Neumünster  State/Province: Schleswig-Holstein  Country: Germany  Telephone: 01762 223 3089

To clarify, if you choose DHL for shipping, our German warehouse will generate a return label using their account. You simply need this tracking number to drop off your package at a DHL service point. Shipping it yourself would likely be more expensive.

Hello,










I chose DHL and I would like to ship via your generated shipping label.








---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
Hello, here is your return label. You can take your package to DHL for shipping. We will process your refund once we receive and inspect the returned item.  Logistics Tracking Number: 510159570014

Hello,

Today I tried to send the parcel and in post office and they say that they
can`t find an parcel number in their system via bar code and i need a new 
label. 
Maybe i need to do something before taking parcel to the Czech post office
(we don`t have DHL but it cooperate with CZ post)?






---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com

So i find out that that parcel in DHL system so I`ll try on some DHL service
point



---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: dikiv4ik@seznam.cz
Komu: service@simsonn.com

Hello, I am very interested in the status of my refund.---------- Původní e-
mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
Okay, we will confirm the status of the shipment with our German warehouse staff immediately.

Hello, 






I'm willing to know in what status my money return 


---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
We shall process your refund this evening or tomorrow morning. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
Hello, we have processed your refund and deducted the shipping costs from the refund amount.
